website_summaries.verdict: From work to play and everything in between, you'll love this Bulova watch for its timeless design and build that withstands moisture.
pros: A striking watch with ruggedly-handsome looks
Has a substantial build and chronograph style with 4 sub dials
Water resistant to 984 feet means it can be worn diving
Looks good enough to wear with numerous fashions
cons: Somewhat large, and feels a bit heavy
Some wearers wish the luminosity of the markers were a bit brighter
On the higher end of the price scale

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, the pieces that are still there at least
customer_reviews.text: Bought watch in February (10 months ago) within a few months, the little screws started falling off. To date, 3 have fallen off. Contacting warranty company has gotten us nowhere. Fiancee is sales rep, so not as though it excessive wear & tear. Very frustrating and a lot of jewelers don't want to touch it. Beautiful watch with pieces falling off. Attached pic to show what pieces I'm referring to.
customer_reviews.author: BBK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite watch of my collection!!.. This watch is a couple hundred dollars cheaper here then some major named Jewerly stores. The watch is a little heavy and bulky but I like that look. Every time I where it I receive at least one complement. I have dropped the watch on pavement and only had a couple scratches which shoes its durability. I have yet to get watch clean and polished and it still looks shiny after 4 months of owning it. I highly doubt I'll use all the features like the chronograph but these features distinguish it's worth while displaying it's sporty/ causal design
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Don't Let the Size Fool You - It's AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. No complaints. I wasn't used to wearing a heavy watch and was a little concerned about the weight. But, after only one day of wearing this watch, my body got used to it and now I don't even know it's on. You do need to be a little more attentive to where you're sticking your hand though - I reached into my mailbox like I normally do, and it took a good "thud" - no damage though. This is a classic watch. I may buy another one in a different finish. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Korona

customer_reviews.title: Beauty attached to a cheap bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I think most of the reviews covered this watch. However, one thing I'd like to add. Despite the fact the watch is really well made and extremely precise, starting from the placement of hands until keeping the time, the steel strap however feels very cheap, which is a big turn off when buying a watch. You could tell by the retelling noise the bracelet produces when moving the watch. I usually don't experience that in expensive watches such as this one, I'd rather experience it with cheap fake watches as they try to execute under a low budget. I love the watch but I'm very disappointed with the rattling noise in the steel strap makes.
customer_reviews.author: EiboTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: It is heavy and I don't recommend it for small guys or thin arms
customer_reviews.text: It's big, bold and has a very smooth second hand sweep that is smoother than my automatic swiss made watches. It is heavy and I don't recommend it for small guys or thin arms! Time will tell (pun intended) whether this watch holds up but it does appear rugged. This watch and similar Bulova precisonist makes would be a great present for a man who likes watches. Of course nobody needs a watch this big. Nobody needs a watch with a 1/1000th second timer or a water safety depth of 300 meters (app 1000 ft). But that's the point. No guy needs a 600 hp sports car either...
customer_reviews.author: Doodles

customer_reviews.title: A True Instrument of Precision for under $500 😄😃😎
customer_reviews.text: This watch is an excellent time piece. I can't even keep count how many times I find myself looking at my wrist. Very accurate and beautiful. I'm thinking about getting the all black version. It's a true instrument of precision. If you want a watch that is very well made and under $500. Look no further I'm truly in love.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great value! In a league of its own!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beautiful colossus of a watch. It is so much fun to operate and is quite the conversation starter. While it may not be what would be considered a luxury timepiece, the price, features, functionality and feel leave it in a class all its own. Even the expert Chicago watch/clock repair owner of a well respected shop was amazed. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: mjbatz

customer_reviews.title: I like the weight and the style of the watch but not sure if it is a Genuine Bulova
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight and the style of the watch....just not sure if it is a genuine Bulova or not as neither Bulova nor the seller has confirmed that this is in fact genuine. this model does not reflect the 262KHZ as the version advertised on Bulova's site. The seller responded that they only sell genuine products but would investigate with Bulova around the production runs and if there was an updated version produced. This was two weeks ago and still no feedback. I have also sent Bulova numerous follow-ups and no response to date.
customer_reviews.author: Babavis

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. It's very high tech. I check it with US clock standard from Boulder, Colorado. Right on. I believe the 10 secs per year. The weakest point is the illumination in dark. Normal, not up to the higher priced watches. Tritium dial would be fantastic. Reads to 0.001 seconds. Very unusual.
customer_reviews.author: Damon F. Rath

customer_reviews.title: My very first Bulova Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ever Bulova watch and let me tell you its a must get. I get compliments about this watch almost two or three times daily since I've gotten this watch. It's kinda heavy at first but then you'll get used to it. I've seen reviews about this product with some fog or mist issue, well thankfully this hasn't happen to me; beside this watch comes with a three year manufacture warranty. It's all good. Main reason I bought this watch is for my college graduation this coming spring and summer semester.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my BF for Yule, he loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My BF wanted a nice new watch after his old one stopped working. After price checking at the mall I decided to find one online. The price on amazon was much much cheaper, the packaging was nice in a Bulova box. I got it in time for the first night of Yule (the 21st of Dec). He absolutely loved it and couldn't wait to take it to the watch shop to have it properly sized and time set. He hasn't stopped bragging about it since. It's a large heavy watch, very "manly". It looks really great on him and goes with anything he wears.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nachtman

customer_reviews.title: Precisionist - It says it all, sculpted edges, gleaming facets and a perfect mechanical look.
customer_reviews.text: This watch amazes! Its style is bold and classy. The function is what you would expect from a high manufacturer like Bulova, but they truly let the designer give this one mechanical lines. It feels alive on your arm as though it were a sculpted working robot. I'm not really a Transformers fan but one might the comparison, with the sculpted edges, shiny facets and physical mass of this watch. A perfect fit out of the box - this watch exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Redhookski

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautifulwatch in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Face and arms are not as vivid yellow and blue as they appear in picture. Overall, face is so busy that I had a hard time telling time. It's a beautiful watch in the picture. The real thing is much greyer colored and busy. I sent it back and Area Trend refunded me no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubby definitely gave it a thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby was speechless when I gave it to him for our 2 year wedding anniversary. He really likes it and adjusted the links and worked work the very next day. It was like watching a little kid with a new toy... Lol has everything he needs and more. The nice metal rugged hexagon screws, 900 feet water resistance which he needs for surfing. I'm sure he will enjoy it for years to come. Bulova is an awesome name brand that stands the test of time. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Darquea

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge, heavy, shiny watch that will absolutely get a lot of attention. It has an industrial look to it and, as a watch collector, I can say that it looks like it cost at least twice what it does. One word of caution: it is HUGE. If you have thin arms\/wrists, look for something else. I have an 8" wrist and it works; any smaller, and I'd be concerned. I had to take two links out to get it to fit. Have I mentioned that this thing is BEAUTIFUL?
customer_reviews.author: bthomas0814

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome watch, it looks way better in person, I was paranoid about how good the deal was so I took it into a jewelry store and compared with one there just to be sure it was real and they are identical so no worries there, it is a heavy watch but I really like that about it also
customer_reviews.author: ChrisS.

customer_reviews.title: Eye-catching watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband's birthday and he absolutely loved it. He gets so many compliments on it. He loves that it's a dive watch, so he doesn't have to take it off when he gets in the pool. It's definitely a statement watch. It catches the eye without being gaudy. We're extremely happy with this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Nuits en soie

customer_reviews.title: This thing is beefy!!
customer_reviews.text: I do believe the watch could stop a damn bullet!! you know you are wearing it but that's what I wanted. Get compliments all the time...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Q.

customer_reviews.title: This is about the best watch i
customer_reviews.text: This is about the best watch i,ve ever owned! I would normally never had bought this watch,far too expensive, but getting it during the Black Friday weekend with up to 70% discount meant the price was just right. for me,and I couldn,t resist the temptation to buy it ! I,ve always wanted a Bulova watch,a friend of mine,s dad had the great,great grandfather version back in the 1970,s, and the humming sound it made left us awe struck. This watch is so well made,I,m pleased as punch with it ! Best Xmas present in years. Thank you,Amazon ! Merry Christmas and a fine 2018.2 U all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As an avid watch collector this piece has some pretty lofty competition to contend with in the collection
customer_reviews.text: As an avid watch collector this piece has some pretty lofty competition to contend with in the collection. This is hands down, without a doubt a fine timepiece. The sweep hand is smoother than some of my higher end automatics and the comfort of it on my wrist is unbelievable Especially for such a big watch. The band is very high quality and the jeweler that sized it for me said has hasn't see a band like this in quite a long time. Bulova has knocked this one out of the park. If you are looking to add a reasonably priced, exceptional watch to your collection, I highly recommend the 96B175.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D

customer_reviews.title: Gave As A Gift
customer_reviews.text: Daughter bought for her fiance. He loves it. Turned out to be really attractive, durable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Devaneau

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Curving face and Sweeping hand
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. I Wear this now more then my Tag or Breightling...love the curved crystal and the sweeping hand is smoother then my automatic Tag. This watch should sell for $1,000-1,500 in my opinion. At least it feels and looks of such quality... I believe it retails, at stores like Kay jewelers, for $799. Bulova hit a home run with this one...I just wish the crystal was Saphire but I think they used mineral in order to curve it...
customer_reviews.author: Blind2pigment

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bulova quality. Very presice time piece. Complicated movement, well made. Good looking mens watch.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, the nicest watch I have ever owned. It looks great, keeps perfect time, is water proof, and generally provides everything anyone would want from a sports watch. It also looks good when I go out and dress up. If quality and good looks are your requirements, this watch meets them with style. Dean
customer_reviews.author: Dean T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: This is a beast watch. Bold, boss timepiece!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best watch I've ever bought. It's amazing. Love it! 5 stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Swell

customer_reviews.title: More compliments than my Tag
customer_reviews.text: Was watching the price in my wish list pretty much daily for four months. Saw it fluctuate from the low 3s to high 4's from day to to day. I was not in a hurry so I just waited til I wanted to pull the trigger. Be patient if you can. Very big. Very heavy. My Tag looks like a kids watch compared to this thing. It'll take some getting used to the weight but I just can't stop looking at it. Nice work, Bulova. Great price Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Shehadey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing to look at
customer_reviews.text: Amazing to look at. This is something I saved for. He was so geeked when it arrived. He was blown away at the craftsmanship and quality. It is a bit heavy but he doesn’t mind it.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: I am giving it a 3 stars because I love by love watches
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it a 3 stars because I love by love watches, and this would be the first one I have a problem with. Although the watch itself is flawless, the glass is scratch proof, the wrist band scuffs early. Stainless steel used on the band is not a quality stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: przemyslaw

customer_reviews.title: wonderful watch
customer_reviews.text: I got mine today , and it fits great in my collection. I have mostly big face watches - in the 50mm range, and this one fits right in . Clunky,hefty ,bold -amazing watch. I can't stop playing with it , there are so may things going on on it . Don't regret this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: a4k

customer_reviews.title: I really love thiswatch
customer_reviews.text: I really love this watch. Very heavy, but I was able to get used to it on my wrist after a few days. It arrived in perfect condition as well. The only downside is that I have a very small wrist and had to take it to two different jewelry stores to get resized until it fit right.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Used looking Manufacturer Bulova box
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks great but the Box was damaged and warn. The box actually looks used. Very upset..... manufacturing packaging is just as important when it comes to watches. Made my complaint to Amazon but only received 10% for my grief. I did not want the 10% I rather have the new box.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Quick

customer_reviews.title: And extremely good looking.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding time piece. Superb craftsmanship. Thick and heavy. The most solid watch. And extremely good looking.
customer_reviews.author: M. Leone

customer_reviews.title: The Bulova Precisionist 96B175 watch is EVERTHING I'd wanted and hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful with the substantial weight and gleaming polished finish which I had hoped for. Ordering was made easy for my first time order and I will be using Amazon Prime again. I currently have a subscribed Amazon Prime account.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Ford

customer_reviews.title: The best watch you can get for the money in my ...
customer_reviews.text: The best watch you can get for the money in my opinion very heavy and genuine when you put this on you know you have something very special and it definitely reminds you I get a ton of compliments on his watch!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Byron Alligood

customer_reviews.title: German Jewelry
customer_reviews.text: Large, heavy and built like a tank. It feels like a fine piece of German jewelry. Highly recommended watch the price because it goes up and down. I got it for less than $300. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dale R. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this watch at a jewelry store and wanted it so bad. I tried it on and it feels so quality. It is heavy but in a good way. At the jewelry store it was $850 so I didn’t buy it. I found it on here and immediately bought it. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a nice watch
customer_reviews.text: The real deal. Got it for $244, sold and shipped by amazon... very nice watch
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant timepiece, looks and feels expensive
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant timepiece, looks and feels expensive. The only negative I can point out is that the time markers and the hands are not luminous or luminous enough in the dark. I have a Citizen Eco time piece and you can clearly tell the time in complete darkness as the time markers and the hands are all luminous.
customer_reviews.author: Oga Mutongi

customer_reviews.title: Invicta, eat your heart out!
customer_reviews.text: This company for starters was very quick with delivery and quick in response to some questions I had. The watch itself is the nicest I have ever owned. It weighs so much that I believe it can also be used as a doorstop! Although I would not recommend it...lol. I like the sweeping motion of the second hand. It adds an elegant touch for me. Great watch! Thanks NEthing4U!!
customer_reviews.author: em

customer_reviews.title: Great time piece
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch and I get compliments on it all the time. Kinda hard to read at times, but nevertheless you’ll be happy
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy which I love, bulky and yet elegant on the wrist
customer_reviews.text: Now this a piece that demands attention. It's heavy which I love, bulky and yet elegant on the wrist. This model looks much more expensive than it costs. On of my favorite pieces in my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Dima Oksenkrug

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous watch. Thick and heavy, just the way I like it. The chronograph function is very cool to watch. Would be a perfect watch if it was solar powered... and I'd gladly pay double! All around a beautiful and very masculine looking watch.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: An absolute gem of a watch
customer_reviews.text: An absolute pleasure to wear. This watch gets noticed by non watch people. Not only is there the dead on a accurate Precionist movement, but it"s the most detailed analog stopwatch that I have ever encountered. A worthy addition to my extensive collection.
customer_reviews.author: Mrod

customer_reviews.title: What's there not to love about this beautiful timepiece
customer_reviews.text: What can i say? What's there not to love about this beautiful timepiece. I did my research and this is everything it was advertised as and more. Now i have to see about getting the Gold one
customer_reviews.author: Crest

customer_reviews.title: one of my favorite watches ever
customer_reviews.text: This is among the most distinctive watches in my collection. It's very heavy, shows very well, and feels like it could survive just about anything. It is big and bold, and makes a bold statement on my wrist as well.
customer_reviews.author: K Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Great Solid watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch arrived the very next day. It is big and heavy and feels great on the wrist. I went on line and researched before I bought this watch, and the reviews were mostly positive. I have worn it for the past couple of weeks and have received many compliments on the watch and its' design.
customer_reviews.author: GENNADY SHOR

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is truly amazing!! Its big and super shiny, the precision chronograph until 1/1000 of a second has an hypnotic effect!! The photos dont make justice to it, you have to wear it and really feel it. A work of art and an amazing wristwatch. The only issue I had is that the seller on Amazon did ship to Portugal, but due to the fact that the value of the watch is a bit higher, I had to pay costums and it raised the total price of the watch but it still did payoff. They should warn custom expenses for other countries. Delivery was before the date announced by them, super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: I certainly have an appreciation for the craftsmanship placed in this piece in addition to the wonderful warranty offered by Bul
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable watch! I saved six months for this TIMEPIECE (always wanted to say that lol) and it was worth the wait. I certainly have an appreciation for the craftsmanship placed in this piece in addition to the wonderful warranty offered by Bulova. Please do not take any word I have stated in this as fact. Take a trip to your nearest department store/jeweler and place it on your wrist and compare with other top named brands in similar price range (the full retail $$-not Amazon's). You will immediately recognize the HUGE difference in weight; movement; appearance; and overall craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Winston B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This watch is Awesome!! And boy does it make a statement!! Be sure to check the dimensions before purchasing, cuz it's big. If you're a little guy with a small wrist, it'll be too big.
customer_reviews.author: J. G. SELLHEIM

customer_reviews.title: Great bling bling watch
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a little disappointed because the watch looked too big and heavy, but every time I look at it, it just looks soooo good. It is a great looking watch even though it is a bit too big for my taste, I expected something a little bit smaller, nevertheless, I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Juancarlos Sala

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal for under $1000
customer_reviews.text: A phenomenal watch for less than $1000. Always receiving compliments. Very reliably built, flawless functionality, heavy and larger than average but sturdy, clean and sharp looking. Attractive but not annoyingly so.
customer_reviews.author: Mary-Kate C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the seconds sweeping hand !
customer_reviews.text: Rugged and stylish looking , the watch looks and works great. I like big watches and this Bulova fits the bill perfectly and I especially love the sweeping seconds hand movement which is so cool for a quartz timepiece. However I was dissapointed with the metal bracelet which scratches too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew JK Tan

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Very clean and impressive looking. The body of the watch is heavy, which is something you typically see in very high end pricey watches. The continuous second hand movement is a noteable positive feature.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Y.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous watch. When I buy a watch, I walk by all watches and only stop when something catches my eye. This is definitely it. Great price for an awesome watch.I have a lot of watches and this is by far the heaviest watch, but after wearing it for a day, you will get used to it and not even notice its weight.
customer_reviews.author: P0L!N

customer_reviews.title: The best time peice which I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: The best time peice which I've ever had. I've a Invicta collection since years but this makes me feel so great when on my wrist. Tons n tons of compliments every where😎
customer_reviews.author: nitin

customer_reviews.title: love this huge watch
customer_reviews.text: Best watch i have ever had,seen or even looked at.it is heavy and just gives you the feel it will last forever if anything ever happened to it i eould instantly buy another.ive had it now for a few years and still love it
customer_reviews.author: Ma Lourdes B. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Best watch ever love it
customer_reviews.text: Best watch ever love it ....looks good , stylish, ☆☆☆☆☆ quality, it's a must have watch & the price is a steal i ordered as soon as i saw the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch!
customer_reviews.text: Watch exactly as described! I have large wrists and it was still able to fit them. Watch is on the heavy side which i was prepared for. A lot of detail went into this watch and I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It's a Monster!
customer_reviews.text: This is a BIG watch! If you're looking for a big, well-made, sporty watch, this is it. Google this watch and read the reviews on the movement Bulova uses and you will find that this is an innovative machine
customer_reviews.author: Juan R. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: My husband is going to be thrilled!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this watch for my husband for his birthday. I love it! Its definitely a man's watch. Its big, heavy, and looks amazing. It arrived fast. This wife right here has done a good job.
customer_reviews.author: David R Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: add was misleading
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the watch due to the lack of description in the add for very good used or returned watch, no bulova watch box, no warranty card, and no manual
customer_reviews.author: thomas schuler

customer_reviews.title: Solid is the best word to describe this watch
customer_reviews.text: Solid is the best word to describe this watch. Everything I have read negative about the watch just takes a little time to get used to. The weight, the hands, and just the overall feel of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is not for the faint of heart. It's got a lot of mass (heft) and takes up a lot of visual real estate. It has a curved mineral glass face that is very nicely-fashioned.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Titanic
customer_reviews.text: This is a working man's, "nice", watch. It's been a few years and I still get compliments.
customer_reviews.author: jackson304

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loved it..it looks so great on his wrist
customer_reviews.author: CONNIE CILETTI

customer_reviews.title: Best looking and best quality watch I own
customer_reviews.text: Best looking and best quality watch I own. I get complimented everywhere I go. if your looking for a big watch that looks awesome look no further...
customer_reviews.author: motomanmel

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. The pictures do not do justice to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. The pictures do not do justice to the face of the watch until you see it in person. Fits well and has a good weight to it. Very happy so far with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Man,s Watch
customer_reviews.text: A real man's watch. Heavy but has a firm fit. Looks as nice as any of my more expensive chronographs. Although it is not a Swiss Automatic, this made in Japan Quartz is an excellent movement. I am completely satisfied with this Bulova timepiece.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for me. Caught it on a lightning deal. Once I got the band adjusted, this bad boy was good to go. Jeweler who took out the 2 links for me offered me double what I paid on the spot so you know it’s legit.
customer_reviews.author: asdfa

customer_reviews.title: great watch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch for the price......feels good and expensive. I receive compliments on a daily basis. The only down side is you can't se the time in the dark but no big deal at all.
customer_reviews.author: Raffi

customer_reviews.title: Super Nice - Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great. I love the yellow sweeping second hand. It's not a Breitling but it's a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: This is the right choice ~
customer_reviews.text: Excited to open the package together a great show in front of the stainless steel watch, oh, my God, my little wrist can take it? Placed in the hands, really heavy, 13.76oz, but it does not matter. Remove two bracelets, my wrist fully fit; dial is raised, great personality; turn off the lights, luminous hands and dial really; there is an interesting feature: the timing and speed, not yet tested, but the way home from the company can try; I have a question to ask: How can I find the verification Code? Can someone tell me? Thank you very much ~
customer_reviews.author: Yang Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for your favorite watch addict
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Fathers Day and he is absolutely in love with it. It does a bunch of stuff I could care less about but makes it that much cooler for him. The design is nice and sporty but sleep and sexy at the same time. It curves around your wrist to make it more comfortable. It is very heavy for a watch but that should be expected with what this bad boy does.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Drury

customer_reviews.title: Great watch.
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves this watch. Can be dressed up or down. The size is substantial. My husband is a big guy and it looks very manly on him. Very nice product and great price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Stunning watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful, the attention to detail and quality are beyond all expectations. I would recommend this watch to all my friends and family.......
customer_reviews.author: Simon Tomkinson

customer_reviews.title: This is a good looking watch and the features are cool
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking watch and the features are cool, but this watch is BIG and HEAVY. I’m a big guy (6 ft 240 lbs) and this watch is like wearing a dumbbell around your wrist. Too big and heavy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: I can't quit admiring it.
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews, watched all the review videos on YouTube, and this watch still exceeded my expectations. The weight is great. It's a chunk and rests beautifully on the wrist. The curved glass catches the light nicely and makes it visually interesting when you go to check the time. The sweeping seconds hand glides beautifully. The carbon fiber texture on the face rides just above the darker base below it, giving a depth that compliments the size of the watch. The buttons are sturdy and the crown is solid. The wrist band is both industrial and elegant. You will not regret this purchase if you're a guy who wants a cool modern chronograph.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Savage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect everyday sport watch
customer_reviews.text: Wear it every day and it never fails to get a compliment. Hasn't lost a second
customer_reviews.author: Mark Posey

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: Amazon had the best price for this watch. It is a very chunky watch and makes a "statement". The sweeping second hand is very impressive. I own several higher-end Bulova watches and have never had a problem with any of them. Love the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Vulcan2016

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The most beautiful watch I own hands down. Pictures do it absolutely no justice!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Watch!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutly awesome watch! I couldnt be happier with my new Bulova watch!
customer_reviews.author: Tarron Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Heavy Watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is pretty hefty, but doesn't appear cheap or distasteful at all. Definitely an attention getter...but perhaps not the most practical for daily wear.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Calvin

customer_reviews.title: good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: this watch is HUGH. good looking watch, quality of craftsmanship is what was expected just some much bigger than the picture makes it appear.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy G.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got mine for Christmas this year and it's a very nice watch. It is also a big watch, you can tell it's there. The only downside to it is that I do catch it on a lot of stuff but it looks good with a suit or for just casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Just Received My Watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is more than I expected. I enjoy having a chronograph watch though I don't use all the applications very often. This watch is absolutely beautiful and very masculine. It is big and heavy and will take some time to get used to. I know I will get many compliments on the Precisionist and rightfully so. It looks like it should cost many times more than I paid for it on Amazon. I was wavering between this and a Citizen Eco-Drive and went with the Bulova. I couldn't be happier! This is one heck of a watch. Man, is it ever!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for much more
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this watch almost a week ago, and I could not be happier with my decision. Just as a fair warning to anyone thinking about buying this watch, it is a BIG watch. The face alone is about 3/4 inches deep, and 2 inches long and wide. I have fairly small wrists, so it does look a bit oversized, but I knew that about this watch before I purchased it. My local macys had this watch on display so I was able to see it before I bought it. I would recommend the same thing to anyone that is questions if they should buy this or not.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: A Real Head Turner
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, Show piece that gets noticed daily. Get stopped regularly and asked about it . Nice piece and the prices keep dropping.. may buy another
customer_reviews.author: BizWiz

customer_reviews.title: I like the uniqueness of this watch
customer_reviews.text: I like the uniqueness of this watch. I haven't seen anyone in my area with one even slightly similar. Received one compliment the very first day wearing this watch. This is a big watch. Two links had to be removed to fit my 7.5 inches in circumference wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Parris

customer_reviews.title: Bold and impressive watch.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking quality watch. Been getting compliments about it from random people and I’ve only worn it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: P Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love this...it has been almost a year...
customer_reviews.text: i write this..many months..maybe a year after purchase. This killer watch still looks great..and was a fraction of the cost at high end department stores. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch with some WEIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch with some WEIGHT. Its big, bulky, shiny and draws lots of attention. Nice detail in the face and dials. This watch demands attention, the only thing is that its impossible to see in the dark but I always carry my cell phone so who really cares. You can see the carbon fiber face, the second hand is smooth and the face is actually curved. Great buy, highly recommend and worth the $799.00 retail price ....Thanks amazon for saving me over 60%
customer_reviews.author: Morty

customer_reviews.title: Impressive  looking.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is absolutely the best. It has Cool just dripping off of it. Got it for a splurge for my 60th birthday. I got it a week before my birthday, and I'm waiting to wear it on my birthday out to dinner with my wife, although been wearing in at home. Showed many people at work a picture, and all seem impressed. Seems like it should last for many years. MW, Louisville
customer_reviews.author: mark wright

customer_reviews.title: Man's Watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his watch. He can't stop looking at it and gets lots of comments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I love Bulova watches and I got ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I love Bulova watches and I got this for less than half of what it cost in the jewelry or department store. I've had a couple bulova's before so I know the price. I've been wanting this for a long time and I have a couple friends and brother who are going to get a Precicionist Bulova from Amazon. Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Father's Day gift for my husband and he loves it very much! In fact he said this is by far his most favorite and most expensive watch!
customer_reviews.author: kevin b.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. Very dominant and for larget wrists
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Very dominant and for larget wrists. Definitely attracts attention. Sweeping second hand. I Use it everyday at work and yes people glance at it.
customer_reviews.author: F S

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Got multiple compliments the first night I wore it. Heavier and bigger than my other watches but you don't even notice that after a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Very bad for a watch that is worth almost
customer_reviews.text: The box is the watch came in was dented and it was not even cleaned properly on the inside. By the time I opened the package watch was out of the socket and box was open. Very bad for a watch that is worth almost $500
customer_reviews.author: gowtham

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Excelente. High quality and nice looking for an awesome price.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and really nice weight to it. Gets a compliment every time its worn.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

product_meta.title: Bulova Men's 96B175 Precisionist Stainless Steel Watch
product_meta.description:
Black dial enhanced by silver-tone skeleton hands. Silver-tone stainless steel case with a silver-tone stainless steel band. Quartz movement. 300 meters / 1000 feet water resistance. Fixed bezel. Scratch Resistant Mineral crystal. Solid caseback. Fold Over with Single Push Button Release clasp. Screw Down crown. Case size 46.5 mm x 18 mm. Band 22 mm x 9 incheslong. Bulova 96B175 Precisionist Watch.




From the Precisionist Collection. Featuring Bulova’s proprietary Precisionist accuracy, this advanced chronograph offers 1/1,000-second precision over a twelve-hour time frame, with accuracy to within seconds a year. In stainless steel with curved crystal, multiple-layer black carbon fiber, blue, silver and black dial, chronograph measurement of hours, minutes, seconds, 1/10-seconds, 1/100-seconds and 1/1,000-seconds, yellow continuously sweeping second hand, luminous hour and minute hands, luminous markers, tachymeter, calendar, screw-back case, screw-down crown, double-press fold-over clasp with safety lock, and water resistance to 300 meters.

Providing an extraordinary level of timing accuracy, the Bulova Precisionist Chronograph is the only chronograph to combine stopwatch timing to 1/1,000-second with Bulova’s exclusive Precisionist-class torsional resonator movement, proven in laboratory testing to be one of the world’s most accurate.

Easy and logical to read, each style features four subdials to display the cumulative time at a single glance, with individual measurements on the combined 1/10- and 1/100-second counter, as well as the hour and minute dials, dual-duty floating second hand, and a distinctive 1/1,000-second track with retrograde indicator.



Precisionist Technology

At the heart of the watch is the Bulova Precisionist-class torsional resonator movement, custom-engineered to provide accuracy to within seconds a year using a three-prong quartz crystal that creates a vibration frequency of 262.144 kHz, the highest of any watch in the world and far greater than that of a standard quartz crystal. In laboratory testing, the Precisionist-class movement has been shown to be three times more accurate than standard quartz. This proprietary manufactured movement, including the signature floating second hand, also offers a resistance to gravitational error that makes it superior in performance to any mechanical watch on the market.

Summary of Features

Precision timing to 1/1,000th of a second12-hour chronograph functionOne of the world’s most accurate movements – accurate to within seconds a yearPrecisionist-class torsional resonator movement proven in laboratory testing to be three times more accurate than standard quartzStainless steel case and braceletCurved mineral crystalMultiple-layer black carbon fiber, blue and silver dialYellow continuously sweeping second handLuminous hour and minute handsLuminous markersCalendar windowTachymeterScrew-backScrew-down crownWater resistant to 300 metersAbout Bulova

In 1875, Joseph Bulova, a 23-year-old immigrant, set up shop in New York City and a legendary American watch brand was born. Since then, Bulova has stood proudly in the vanguard of timekeeping innovation, committed to the legacy of creativity and excellence established by its founder.

A pioneering force in the industry, Bulova transformed how watches were worn and how time was perceived, registering over 50 patents as he and his company built a record of creativity including the first full lines of men’s (1919) and ladies’ (1924) wristwatches, the first clock/radio (1928) and the first electric clock (1931). To ensure the utmost in precision, in 1920, Bulova even established its own observatory – located atop its New York skyscraper. With that same spirit of innovation, following World War II, determined “to serve those who served us,” Bulova established The Bulova School of Watchmaking, using new and unique methods to train disabled veterans for positions in the watch and jewelry industry. Then, in 1960, Bulova changed timekeeping forever with the revolutionary Accutron, the world’s first fully electronic watch. An integral component of U.S. space technology, Accutron timing was used on 46 NASA missions, including Apollo XI, the first lunar landing (1969).

Today, as one of the world’s most recognized brands, Bulova has expanded across the globe, with four separate watch brands, Bulova, Bulova AccuSwiss, Bulova Accutron II and Caravelle New York, as well as the award-winning Bulova Clocks.

The signature Bulova brand provides an extensive selection of watches for every occasion, crafted of the finest materials, including 315L surgical grade stainless steel, diamonds, mother-of-pearl, carbon fiber, top-quality leather and Bulova’s proprietary Duramic nylon/ceramic composite, and powered by Precisionist-class quartz, automatic and quartz movements. An industry leader in diamond watch styling, with the new Diamond Gallery offering exquisite designs in stainless steel with sapphire crystals, Bulova is also known for Precisionist, featuring Bulova’s proprietary Precisionist-class quartz torsional resonator movement for accuracy to within seconds per year, the Marine Star collection, combining high-performance sports timekeeping with superior durability and water resistance to a minimum of 100 meters, and a comprehensive selection of classic styles, each with a three-year limited warranty.






PRODUCT DETAILS
 *  User Manual [PDF ] 
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :0.39 x 0.39 x 0.39 inches; 9.14 Ounces
 * Item model number :96B175
 * Department :Watches AND JEWELRY
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :September 24, 2012
 * Manufacturer :Bulova
 * ASIN :B0088BMYN4

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};
 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #236,574 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #1688 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #66124 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars696 ratings Black dial enhanced by silver-tone skeleton hands. Silver-tone stainless steel case with a silver-tone stainless steel band. feature_bullets: Technical dive watch featuring hex-screw accents at bezel and mixed-media dial with four chronograph subdials
46.5 mm stainless steel case with mineral dial window
Japanese quartz movement with analog display
Stainless steel band with fold-over clasp with single push-button safety closure
Water resistant to 300 m (984 ft): In general, suitable for mixed-gas diving.262kHz vibrational frequency
